casebody.data:
Sabra A. HORVAT, Plaintiff Below, Appellant,
v.
The STATE OF DELAWARE OFFICE OF MANAGEMENT & BUDGET, an agency of the State of Delaware, The State of Delaware Superior Court, an entity of the State of Delaware, and The State of Delaware, Defendants Below, Appellees. No. 483, 2017 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: June 13, 2018
Decided: June 15, 2018

AFFIRMED.
